ing: 1 (.25 ounce) package unsweetened lemonade drink mix
des: "A colorful punch that is not only great for weddings but wedding and baby showers also! I use this one a lot because it is tasty and simple to prepare, just read the instructions and you'll see what I mean. can be doubled easily!"
ins: In a large punch bowl combine orange juice, pineapple juice, lemonade drink mix, almond extract and sugar to taste. Pour in the punch until desired color is achieved.
